titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and commons of the city of London in Common Councell assembled, concerning church government: presented to the House of Peers upon Fryday the 16. of Ianuary 1645. With the answer thereunto. Die Veneris 16. Ian. 1645. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that this petition, with the answer thereunto, shall be forthwith printed and published. Ioh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1645[6]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1646.
Requests "that no Toleration be granted of Popery, Schisme, Prophanenesse, Etc."--Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the old Bayley.
